sinks.sink_description: Creates and binds a TCP listening socket on the specified port and all network interfaces (INADDR_ANY), exposing a network service.

required_conditions.description: The caller must be authorized to open and bind a listening TCP socket on the specified port and interface(s).
The port value provided to the function must be constrained so that only intended ports can be opened for listening.

sinks.sink_description: Marks the bound socket as a listening socket, enabling it to accept incoming connections on the chosen port.

required_conditions.description: Establishing a listening TCP service on the chosen port must be restricted to authorized callers or processes.
